net.jmatrix.eproperties.monitor
Class EPropertiesMonitor

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      net.jmatrix.eproperties.monitor.EPropertiesMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class EPropertiesMonitor
extends Thread

This class monitors URLs for changes (via URL dependent methods) and will reload the properties if the URLs have changed.

This is a single monitor thread. This thread monitors all properties files in a single thread - as there may be many files. The thread is initialized internally if a single properties object registers itself. Its delay time is globally configurable.
